resources.string: FytFunctionalityExtender
Application preferences
Miscellaneous ON/OFF Settings
Use root access for the system call
ON: the system call is executed as root
OFF: the system call is executed as normal user
Define apps or actions when the contact/unit is switched ON or OFF; or when coming out of resume.
What to do when contact is switched on (ACC_ON)
ACC_ON: Call method
ACC_ON: String to be used
ON: The WiFi is switched on when the contact is switched on (to overcome PX5 bug)
OFF: Do not touch the WiFi state when contact is switched on
Option to switch on WiFi during acc_on.
ON: Restart active media player when contact is switched on
OFF: Do not restart active media player when contact is switched on
Option to restart the active media player during acc_on.
What to do when contact is switched off (ACC_OFF)
ACC_OFF: Call method
ACC_OFF: String to be used
ON: Switch off WiFi when contact is switched off
OFF: Do not touch the WiFi state when contact is switched off
Option to switch off WiFi during acc_off.
ON: Pause active media player when contact is switched off
OFF: Do not pause active media player when contact is switched off
Option to pause the active media player during acc_off.
